attributes.action: Increase fines and punishment for littering across the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to act now to increase bins and recycling bins around the U.K. increase fines for those that litter and punish repeat offenders.
attributes.background: We have been on lockdown for a while now and our beautiful countryside is reaping the benefit. For too long people have littered out green and pleasant land and enough is enough!

rejection.details:
Increase penalties, enforcement and education to tackle littering & fly tipping:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324488
